LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_I.label: Robotics:\nSimple Logic
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_I.description: Tier 1: Investigation into the production of the Simple Robotic Matrix units to make robots with workskill 4.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_II.label: Robotics:\nBasic Logic
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_II.description: Tier 2: Investigation into the production of the Basic Robotic Matrix units to make robots with workskill 8.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_III.label: Robotics:\nIntermediate Logic
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_III.description: Tier 3: Investigation into the production of the Intermediate Robotic Matrix units to make robots with workskill 13.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_IV.label: Robotics:\nAdvanced Logic
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_IV.description: Tier 4: Investigation into the production of the Advanced Robotic Matrix units to make robots with workskill 16.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_V.label: Robotics:\nAnti-Logic\n(NP=P)
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Matrix_V.description: Tier 5: Break the boundaries set by existing levels of technology, understandings of logic, and the very concepts of causation. Our scientific horizons are becoming a lot more timey-wimey. Investigation into the production of the Anti-Logic Robotic Matrix units to make robots with workskill 20.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Fundamentals.label: Robotics:\nFundamentals
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Fundamentals.description: Tier 0:\nInvestigation into the easiest principles of robotics and automation.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Cleaner_All.label: Cleaner
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Cleaner_All.description: Production of cleaning robots. The Hauling and Cleaning bots are faster than all other bots of the same tier.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Hauler_All.label: Hauler
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Hauler_All.description: Production of Hauling robots. The Hauling and Cleaning bots are faster than all other bots of the same tier.

LanguageData.RPP_Research_Kitchen_All.description: Production of a Simple Chef and Gardening robot.
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Omni_All.label: Omni-robotics
LanguageData.RPP_Research_Omni_All.description: Production of Omni robots that combine the jobs of all the other robots.
